push(act, force=False)[source]¶

Pushes a dialogue act into the agenda.

Parameters

  • act (DialogueAct) – dialogue act to be appended

  • force (bool) – does not remove act if it already is in the agenda, potentially resulting in duplicates

Returns: None

semantic_noise(act)[source]¶

Simulates semantic noise. It receives an act and introduces errors given the Error Model’s probabilities.

Parameters

act – the act to be confused

Returns

the confused act
